title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.19 - Food service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.19 - Food service

State Regulations
(a) Kitchens, dining areas and food service shall comply with Part 14 of this Title. (b) When food is provided by the camp, it shall be of sufficient quantity and quality for the nutritional needs of each child. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-2.19

Amended

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
